full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing Services

### Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Desmarais Detachment in Wabasca-Desmarais, Alberta, invites bids for the supply and delivery of Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing Services at the RCMP Desmarais Detachment.

Bidders may submit a bid for either Grounds Maintenance Services or Snow Clearing Services, or both. Each service category will be evaluated separately, and up to two contracts may be awarded.

### Key Requirements

*   Supply and delivery of Grounds Maintenance Services from May 1st to October 31st
*   Supply and delivery of Snow Clearing Services from November 1st to April 30th
*   Total contract period of 24 months from Contract Start Date
*   Identification as an Indigenous business may be advantageous

### Bid Evaluation Criteria

*   Price
*   Compliance with bid solicitation requirements
*   Satisfying all mandatory technical evaluation criteria

### Key Dates
*   Proposal due date: 25 November 2022, 15:00 MDT
*   Contract award: To be determined

### Contact Information

*   Balaski, Shawn
*   Email: [Balaski.S.Shawngc@RCMP-grc-gc.ca](mailto:Balaski.S.Shawngc@RCMP-grc-gc.ca)
*   Phone: 780-670-8592

Attachments

*   Annex C - SRC 01 - 2019 R001
*   Annex E - List of Names for Integrity Verification Form
*   ITT En - Grounds Maintenance & Snow Removal Services [RCMP Desmarais Detachment]

Language of Communication

*   Either official language of Canada (English or French)
